column1: While Dande wondered how to punish Madola
column2: a small black poisonous snake entered one of the gourds unnoticed. Afterwards
column3: Dande sealed the gourds and left. Dande gave Madola one gourd expecting his pay. After tasting
column5: "Bring me another gourd and I will pay you." Dande ran for it. Dande brought the second gourd. He gave it to Madola saying
column6: "Here is another gourd of sweet honey like the last one. Pay me now." Madola took the gourd but said in a cunning way
column7: "There is no pay today. Wait for the end of the year." Dande was angry. Madola wanted to eat the honey. He put his finger in the gourd and was bitten. He cried
column8: "I'm bitten! Help!" The snake disappeared unnoticed. All the workers ran away not knowing what had happened to their employer. A short while later
column9: an ambulance arrived to take Madola to hospital.
